## Fishery monitoring and harvest techniques (NB/CL/FM) {##sec:fishery-monitoring}

```{r fishery-projects}
con <- get_db_connection()
fishery_projects <- dbGetQuery(con, "
  SELECT project_number, source, project_title
  FROM projects
  WHERE include = 'y'
    AND broad_header = 'Fishery monitoring and harvest techniques'
    AND section = 'Fishery monitoring and harvest techniques'
  ORDER BY project_number
")
dbDisconnect(con)

knitr::kable(fishery_projects)
```

Describe the harvest transformation pillar of PSSI, DFO Science sub-initiatives, and key areas of monitoring and research. Projects and themes include:

-   Enhancements to recreational monitoring

    -   MSF reference fishery (Erin Rechisky)

    -   Creel monitoring capacity improvements (Natalie Fuller)

    -   First Nations-led catch monitoring on the Central Coast (BCSRIF, Megan Adams)

-   Research on release mortality and best practices for recreational fisheries

    -   Mortality of released Pacific Salmon in marine recreational fishery (BCSRIF, Scott Hinch)

    -   FRIM - short-term holding and respirometry studies (BCSRIF, SFIB)

-   Bycatch monitoring in commercial fisheries

    -   Salmon bycatch monitoring in the trawl fishery (Cory Lagasse)

-   Selective harvest methods and monitoring to support adaptive management

    -   Computer vision for adaptive management of terminal salmon fisheries (BCSRIF, Will Atlas)

    -   Fish trap pilot study (BCSRIF, Derek Leboeuf)
